description: This simple Italian classic is like sunshine in a bowl with zingy lemon, chilli and rich anchovy.
name: Anchovy, Lemon & Chilli Linguine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red chillies, deseeded, finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan on low heat, gently heat the oil with the garlic and anchovies for 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat and leave to infuse for 10 minutes.
Bring a large pan of water to the boil and cook the linguine according to pack instructions. Drain and reserve 100ml of starchy water.

Remove the garlic from the oil and add the linguine. Tip in the lemon zest, chilli, parsley and lemon juice and zest. Add a couple of tablespoons of starchy water to loosen. Stir through the parmesan and serve with cracked black pepper.
